Class SubOpAxis

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Long>, Iterator<Long>

    public class SubOpAxis
extends AbsObAxis

    AddOpAxis

    Performs an arithmetic subtraction on two input operators.

    • Method Detail

      • operate

        public AtomicValue operate(AtomicValue mOperand1,
                  AtomicValue mOperand2)
                    throws TTXPathException
        Performs the operation on the two input operands. First checks if the types of the operands are a valid combination for the operation and if so computed the result. Otherwise an XPathError is thrown.
        Specified by:
        operate in class AbsObAxis
        Parameters:
        mOperand1 - first input operand
        mOperand2 - second input operand
        Returns:
        result of the operation
        Throws:
        TTXPathException - if the operations fails

      • getReturnType

        protected Type getReturnType(int mOp1,
                 int mOp2)
                      throws TTXPathException
        Checks if the types of the operands are a valid combination for the operation and if so returns the corresponding result type. Otherwise an XPathError is thrown. This typed check is done according to the Operator Mapping.
        Specified by:
        getReturnType in class AbsObAxis
        Parameters:
        mOp1 - first operand's type key
        mOp2 - second operand's type key
        Returns:
        return type of the arithmetic function according to the operand type combination.
        Throws:
        TTXPathException - if type is not specified
